scripts.start: npm run build --prefix ./client && npm run build --prefix ./server && npm run start:prod --prefix ./server
scripts.build: concurrently " npm run build:server " " npm run build:client "
scripts.start:dev: npm run start:server & npm run start:client
scripts.postinstall: npm install --prefix client && npm run build --prefix client && npm run prestart:prod --prefix server
